Category 1

Summary of a category. It is just a special placeholder wrapped in a particular class, so it looks more interesting. You can always make your own layout for a category, or make a category.html look the way you want. If you want to see the source code of this theme, feel free to check out the repository on GitHub.

Showcase of customizing aggregator site

Title for this section

    Super cat

    With this customization you can showcase here whatever you want, and create a separate pages fot each of those. This one will redirect to the Super cat site

    CatoCat

    CatoCat description. It's very fun and so on.
Title for this section

    Gate page

    This particular cell will take you to the gate webpage, which is a former "homepage". You can still use it if you want!

    Ko-fi

    If you enjoy what I'm doing, maybe you want to sponsor me a coffee?

Example post 2

2020-11-22

This is summary of a post. It will appear in the page of it's category with the summary shown. Clicking each of them will redirect to the page of the post.

Example of external post

2020-11-01

This is summary of a post, that has it's own external_url property. It will appear in the page of it's category with the summary shown. Clicking each of them will redirect to the external url.
